name: Meta tags IO generator
author: Nik Radevic

sections.description:
Meta tags IO generator is an easy to use plugin which serves as one-stop solution to meta tags. You can simply add meta image, site title, description using the dedicated dashboard and the meta tags are auto generated to the <head>.

There other features as well, such as WooCommerce integration to rock your products in social media, independent posts/pages with their own meta such as Post title, post featured image etc.

Great thanks to Sergey Babayan, Prospectacy Operations Manager for his great feedback to get this done.

Dashboard page:
Settings -> Meta Tags
sections.faq:
Are there any settings?

Yes, there are is a dedicated dashboard page in WP admin panel in which you can do everything!

How can I make my WP posts have their own meta tags?

Through the dedicated dashboard page, simple check the radio button 1->Use featured image for WP Posts & 2->Use teaser/excerpt for WP Posts

How does WooCommerce works?

You need the integrator plugin to light up your products in social media in a way no one has ever done before.
sections.changelog:
1.3.2

Minor update. General bug fixes.

1.3

Update for 6.1. Added WooCommerce add-on functionalities. Added option to show different meta data on different post

1.1

Fixed bugs where meta image and fields where not displaying

1.0

Initial release.

short_description: Simple meta tags generator to improve sharing appearance accross search engines and social media.
